name: Bubble Original
description:
Bubble original is a delightful and highly addictive bubble shooter game that provides hours of entertainment and relaxation.

Get the online color-matching app and enjoy smooth and addicting gameplay. With so many exciting levels, powerful boosters, and awesome features, you simply won’t put it down. Bubble original will have you addicted from the very first bubbles you shoot down. Pop and break all the balls to move on to the next awesome level. Play and enjoy plenty of fun challenges and puzzles, and make sure to reach the target of each level, clear the board and collect coins. Play it when you want to relax and clear your mind with this pastime shooter game.

HOW TO PLAY
- Match 3 or more bubbles of the same color to make them burst.
- Clear all the bubbles on the screen to progress to the next level.
- Try to earn 3 stars on each level by breaking bubbles continuously for bonus points.
- Enjoy the colorful and relaxing bubble-popping experience.

FUN FEATURES
- More than 2000 challenging levels
- Pop all bubbles & unlock special events
- No energy, no pressure and No Wifi Needed

So, warm up your fingers, take aim, and start popping bubbles to explore thousands of exciting levels and puzzles. Bubble original is a great game for players of all ages, offering hours of fun and brain-teasing challenges. Enjoy this casual shooter and relax while you blast bubbles either online or offline. Have a great time playing!
